author: stoddard
msg: Make file I/O and network I/O writev/sendv APIs consistent.
Eliminate use of ap_iovec_t and use Posix struct iovec. I never
did hear a case (much less a strong case) supporting the need
for ap_iovec_t, so out it goes.

author: manoj
msg: Bring the Unix writev code up-to-date, by updating the writev
interface and returning 0 bytes written on error.

author: stoddard
msg: CreatePipe() returns 0 on failure, not -1. Return correct error status
